enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: SMALL-SCALE A&R PROJECTS UNDER THE CDM
sentences: Parties heard reports from informal groups and considered a non-paper.
Delegates agreed to include environmental and socioeconomic impact assessments in the project design document with bracketed text referring to 'adequate to scale.

' On baselines, Parties agreed to assume the baseline carbon stock is constant throughout the crediting period, and decided that the CDM EB would develop simplified monitoring methodologies for actual net removals.
On monitoring, BURKINA FASO, BOLIVIA and others called for explicit reference to involvement of local participants.
